headline: Union Pacific Defends Mega Railroad Merger After Rival’s Criticisms
summary: Union Pacific defended its proposed $71.5 billion railroad merger after a rival said the merger is "unnecessary, anti-competitive and bad" for the U.S. economy.  BNSF Railway, which Union Pacific competes with in the western half of the country, said that the proposed merger between Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern will "concentrate too much control of the nation's freight market with one railroad leading to long-term harm to competition and resilience in the nation's supply chain."  The Berkshire Hathaway-owned railroad said the merger will result in less competition and higher shipping rates for customers.

raw.headline: Union Pacific Defends Mega Railroad Merger After Rival’s Criticisms

BNSF Railway, which Union Pacific competes with in the western half of the country, said that the proposed merger between Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern will "concentrate too much control of the nation's freight market with one railroad leading to long-term harm to competition and resilience in the nation's supply chain."  The Berkshire Hathaway-owned railroad said the merger will result in less competition and higher shipping rates for customers.

headline: Lowest mortgage rates in over a year, T-Mobile tops Q3 estimates
summary: Yahoo Finance anchor Julie Hyman tracks Thursday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Mortgage rates hit their lowest weekly level in over a year, with the 30-year fixed rate now at 6.19%, according to the newest Freddie Mac (FMCC) data. T-Mobile (TMUS) topped Wall Street's estimates in its third quarter earnings results. Union Pacific (UNP) beat profit estimates. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: Union Pacific’s (NYSE:UNP) Q3 Earnings Results: Revenue In Line With Expectations
summary: Freight transportation company Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 2.5% year on year to $6.24 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.08 per share was 2.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Union Pacific reports Q3 earnings above estimates, revenue slightly below
summary: Investing.com -- Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) reported third-quarter adjusted earnings per share of $3.08, exceeding analyst estimates of $2.99, while revenue came in slightly below expectations at $6.24 billion compared to the consensus estimate of $6.25 billion.

headline: Union Pacific reports 7% higher profits as its CEO makes the case for Norfolk Southern merger
summary: Union Pacific delivered 7% growth in its third-quarter earnings Thursday as its CEO continues to make the case for the potential benefits of acquiring one of the railroad's eastern rivals.  Union Pacific wants to buy Norfolk Southern in a $85 billion deal that would create the first transcontinental railroad.  Union Pacific CEO Jim Vena wrote a letter to employees reiterating that he thinks the merger is great for America because it would enable the railroad to deliver goods more quickly and help the companies that rely on its deliveries of raw materials and finished products.

headline: Union Pacific Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: OMAHA, Neb., October 23, 2025--Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) today reported 2025 third quarter net income of $1.8 billion, or $3.01 per diluted share. Results include merger costs of $41 million, or $0.07 per diluted share. Adjusted 2025 third quarter net income* of $1.8 billion, or $3.08 per diluted share* compares to 2024 third quarter net income of $1.7 billion, or $2.75 per diluted share.

raw.headline: Union Pacific Reports Third Quarter 2025 Results
raw.summary: OMAHA, Neb., October 23, 2025--Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) today reported 2025 third quarter net income of $1.8 billion, or $3.01 per diluted share. Results include merger costs of $41 million, or $0.07 per diluted share. Adjusted 2025 third quarter net income* of $1.8 billion, or $3.08 per diluted share* compares to 2024 third quarter net income of $1.7 billion, or $2.75 per diluted share.
